gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render

Class LineDataRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.FrameRenderer
      • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.LineDataRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer, Transformer

    public class LineDataRenderer
extends FrameRenderer

    A class that renderers the contents of a LineData object. This is generally used for plotting the background to spatial plots.

    TODO: use optimized version $Log: not supported by cvs2svn $ Revision 1.2 2006/07/22 20:11:08 cervelli Added support for filling. Revision 1.1 2005/08/26 18:05:04 uid879 Initial avosouth commit.
    Author:
    Dan Cervelli
